Description: The SEC announced enforcement actions against 36 municipal underwriting firms for violations in municipal bond offerings.

Agency: Office of the Comptroller of the Currency

Private Litigation Case Title: Diebold et al v. Northern Trust Investments, N.A. et al

Description: The settlement amount listed here refers only to Northern Trust's portion of a larger case relating to the collapse of Enron.
Private Litigation Case Title: Tittle, et al v. Enron Corp, et al

Company: Northern Trust Hedge Fund Services LLC

Description: The Financial Industry Regulatory Authority fined Northern Trust Securities $600,000 for deficiencies in supervising sales of collateralized mortgage obligations (CMOs) and failure to have adequate systems in place to monitor certain high-volume securities trades.
Notes: FINRA is a securities industry self-regulatory body authorized by the federal government.
